
Terraform used the selected providers to generate the following execution plan.
Resource actions are indicated with the following symbols:
  + create

Terraform will perform the following actions:

  # aws_s3_bucket.application_assets will be created
  + resource "aws_s3_bucket" "application_assets" {
      + acceleration_status         = (known after apply)
      + acl                         = (known after apply)
      + arn                         = (known after apply)
      + bucket                      = "acme-prod-application-assets-us-east-1"
      + bucket_domain_name          = (known after apply)
      + bucket_regional_domain_name = (known after apply)
      + force_destroy               = false
      + hosted_zone_id              = (known after apply)
      + id                          = (known after apply)
      + object_lock_enabled         = false
      + region                      = (known after apply)
      + request_payer               = (known after apply)
      + tags                        = {
          + "CostCenter"  = "CC-1234"
          + "Environment" = "production"
          + "Name"        = "acme-prod-application-assets"
          + "Owner"       = "platform-team"
          + "Project"     = "acme-web"
        }
      + tags_all                    = {
          + "CostCenter"  = "CC-1234"
          + "Environment" = "production"
          + "Name"        = "acme-prod-application-assets"
          + "Owner"       = "platform-team"
          + "Project"     = "acme-web"
        }
    }

  # aws_s3_bucket_versioning.application_assets will be created
  + resource "aws_s3_bucket_versioning" "application_assets" {
      + bucket = (known after apply)
      + id     = (known after apply)

      + versioning_configuration {
          + mfa_delete = "Disabled"
          + status     = "Enabled"
        }
    }

  # aws_s3_bucket_server_side_encryption_configuration.application_assets will be created
  + resource "aws_s3_bucket_server_side_encryption_configuration" "application_assets" {
      + bucket = (known after apply)
      + id     = (known after apply)

      + rule {
          + bucket_key_enabled = true

          + apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
              + kms_master_key_id = "arn:aws:kms:us-east-1:123456789012:key/mrk-a1b2c3d4e5f6"
              + sse_algorithm     = "aws:kms"
            }
        }
    }

  # aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block.application_assets will be created
  + resource "aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block" "application_assets" {
      + block_public_acls       = true
      + block_public_policy     = true
      + bucket                  = (known after apply)
      + id                      = (known after apply)
      + ignore_public_acls      = true
      + restrict_public_buckets = true
    }

  # aws_s3_bucket_logging.application_assets will be created
  + resource "aws_s3_bucket_logging" "application_assets" {
      + bucket        = (known after apply)
      + id            = (known after apply)
      + target_bucket = "acme-prod-access-logs-us-east-1"
      + target_prefix = "s3/application-assets/"
    }

  # aws_s3_bucket_lifecycle_configuration.application_assets will be created
  + resource "aws_s3_bucket_lifecycle_configuration" "application_assets" {
      + bucket = (known after apply)
      + id     = (known after apply)

      + rule {
          + id     = "transition-to-ia"
          + status = "Enabled"

          + filter {
              + prefix = ""
            }

          + transition {
              + days          = 90
              + storage_class = "STANDARD_IA"
            }

          + transition {
              + days          = 180
              + storage_class = "GLACIER"
            }

          + noncurrent_version_expiration {
              + noncurrent_days = 365
            }
        }
    }

Plan: 6 to add, 0 to change, 0 to destroy.
